description: Automatically connects and stays connected to their servers and THEY store your chat history. Don't say anything big broher or group think doesn't like.

For purely chat functionality, I don't think it gets any better than this. It's the most modern and easy to use IRC client I've ever tried. My only gripe is that DCC is not supported, which is an essential feature of IRC. If the developers can add support for it, this will be the only IRC client I ever use.
summary: Great for Chat. No DCC support
